`define NUM_ADC_BITS	7 Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code：
`define NUM_ADC_BITS	8

 Correction Criteria：Reduces ADC resolution from 8-bit to 7-bit. This causes incomplete voltage conversion (missing MSB) and leaves vd7 unassigned since the vd array only has indices 0-6. The highest output bit remains undriven, violating the 8-bit output specification.
